'Miscanthus' is a genus of about 15 species of perennial grasses native to
subtropical and tropical regions of Africa and southern Asia, with one species
(M. sinensis) extending north into temperate eastern Asia.

;Selected species *[[Miscanthus floridulus]]
*[[Miscanthus giganteus]] *[[Miscanthus sacchariflorus]] (Amur silver-grass)
*[[Miscanthus sinensis]] *[[Miscanthus tinctorius]] *[[Miscanthus
transmorrisonensis]]
